thread.title: Julio Jones made an incredible sideline catch when the Falcons needed it most
thread.title_full: Julio Jones made an incredible sideline catch when the Falcons needed it most

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Julio Jones made an incredible sideline catch when the Falcons needed it most
text:
Just wow.
Julio Jones has made some sensational catches this postseason, and one even earlier in this game.
But this catch might be his best work yet. The Falcons were facing a loud NRG Stadium crowd that was pumped because of the Patriots score to make it a 28-20 game.
Then this happened:
The play gave the Falcons a first down in Patriots territory. He might be the only receiver who can make that catch. It was also a spot-on throw by Matt Ryan.
